meanings.definition: The burial of a dead body in a grave or tomb.
meanings.sent1: The interment of the deceased was a solemn event.
meanings.sent2: After the funeral, the interment took place at the cemetery.
meanings.sent3: The interment was delayed due to a mix-up with the tombstone.
meanings.sent4: The interment of memories in the grave of time is inevitable.
meanings.sent5: The interment under the old oak tree was a peaceful farewell.

meanings.definition: The act of interring or burying a dead body.
meanings.sent1: Family members participated in the interment ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The priest performed the interment with reverence.
meanings.sent3: The interment turned into a comical mishap when the grave collapsed.
meanings.sent4: The interment of secrets in the ground can be a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The interment proceeded quietly as the sun set over the cemetery.

meanings.definition: The state of being buried in a grave or tomb.
meanings.sent1: The interment of the ancient king was discovered by archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of peace surrounded the interment site.
meanings.sent3: The interment of the treasure was a mystery waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The interment of hopes and dreams can lead to new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The interment in the family plot marked the end of an era.
